Now, how do we add Ria Services and Entity Frameworks into the Solution, but keeping the same Elegant Code that David Hills uses it

Regards

Hi Oscar,

As far a I know, Entity Framework is a server-side framework while Prism is designed to be used on the client-side, so there is no official support for the Entity Framework in Prism. However you might find this tutorial useful to you.

Regarding RIA Services, you can check the following discussions in the forums:

  • Prism+RIA tutorial
  • Prism - Silverlight WCF RIA Services - Authentication

I hope you find this useful,

Damian Cherubini
